basics.name: Divyansh Singhvi
basics.label: Quantitative Researcher @ Millennium | SDE @ Tower Research Capital | CSE @ IIT Kanpur'19

work.name: Millennium
highlights: Developed mid-frequency signals (hours to days horizon) for US and EU equity markets using machine learning
Mentored new hires for their initial training projects.

work.name: Aakraya Research
highlights: Analyzed signals and modelling for end-to-end automated HFT strategy from scratch for NSE equity markets.
Built pipeline for automated signal selection, tuning trading hyperparameters to deploy in production.
Examined trades to infer reasons for profit and loss and eventually using them to improve the strategy.
Low latency code in C++ for co-located deployment of HFT and options market making strategy.

work.name: Tower Research Capital
highlights: Developed a spring boot based RESTful Web Service and co-maintained a golden source of data for division and worked on reconciliation of trades and positions for trading teams

work.name: Tower Research Capital
highlights: Deployed and configured production cluster of ElasticSearch and Kibana for queries and visualization over big data.
Optimized and benchmarked ElasticSearch and Google BigQuery ingest for half billion records per day
Received Pre-placement offer for the work

work.name: Prof. Amey Karkare, IIT Kanpur
highlights: Simulated C codes visualization by integrating CTutor with Prutor for interactive debugging

awards.title: Achievements
awards.summary:
* Ranked 7th among 4245 teams on Jane Street Market Prediction competition on Kaggle.
 * Received Academic Excellence Award for years 2016, 2017 and 2018 by Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Kanpur. 
 * Secured an All India Rank of 383 in JEE Advanced 2015 among 150 thousand students who qualified JEE Mains 
 * Procured an All India Rank of 114 in JEE Mains 2015 among 1.3 million students (top 0.01%). 
 * Among 30 students selected for Indian National Mathematics Olympiad to represent state conducted by HBCSE(TIFR). 
 * Among 45 students selected to attend Selection Camp to represent India at IJSO conducted by HBCSE(TIFR), Mumbai.

publications.name: Active Learning-based Automatic Tuning and Prediction of Parallel I/O Performance
publications.publisher: 2019 IEEE/ACM Fourth International Parallel Data Systems Workshop (PDSW)

publications.name: Knowing Your Nonlinearities: Shapley Interactions Reveal the Underlying Structure of Data
